name: The Witch of Wish Mountain
description:
CW: Mind Control / Manipulation, Gore

Explore a mysterious otherworld filled with powerful beings and esoteric rules in your quest to climb Wish Mountain and have the Witch who resides there grant your greatest wish.

The Witch of Wish Mountain is my attempt to combine childhood fairytales and Table Top RPGs into an interactive fiction game. Taking inspiration from 2 Stat games, Alice in Wonderland and folklore surrounding fairies and the fey. I also wanted to include elements of the fae relating to real-world gender identity, hence my use of fae/faer/faers pronouns.   

External Images & Sound Effects: Here 

How to Play: Click on the prompts displayed on-screen to progress text and make decisions. Make sure to keep your Magic and Mundane stats balanced or else you could end up trapped in or banished from the Lands of the Fae.

Note: Gameplay video contains spoilers, made in Unity using Fungus
